Text.Page:
Ready for another delivery, ?

This one is for Andersen in Pora Elinu. Use a pegasus, and don't attract attention. Our customers appreciate our discretion.
How may I help you today?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"This is from Imesti."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

My package? It's here? Give it to me now! I must have it! It's mine!

Ahem. Sorry about that. Take this for your trouble, and tell Imesti she's a lifesaver.
